answers.answer: You are 20 and you are only 88-90 pounds.  Your body wants food just feed yourself. Why does that bother you?  Where you full after the first two slices of pizza?
have you had your thyroid checked?

Sounds like not enough protein content.Carbs are good but need a bit of protein, good protein, to satiate the stomach or make you feel full. If you are vegetarian Google so you can get info on good proteins, otherwise, grab a burger or real chicken breast. Nothing 'minced'. Sounds like you have a fast metabolism which is good. Body needs fuel.

HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!You will be surprised to know that stomach ulcers and severe acidity can result in hunger pangs. Even GERD presents with similar symptoms. At times the hunger pangs due to acidity wakes up a person in the wee hours of night. Omeprazole is a good drug to combat this. Along with it you can try over the counter antacids. However I would recommend you see a doctor and take medication under a doctor’s supervision. Avoid heavy meals and take frequent small ones. Avoid too much of caffeine, tea, fried food and drinks both alcoholic and non alcoholic fuzzy ones. Avoid heavy exercises within 4 hours of a heavy meal. Raise the head end of the bed by pillows to 30 degrees. Avoid lying down for at least 2 hours after food. Take a late night snack and keep lozenges or crackers beside to bed to be eaten when the  pain starts. If you are on contraceptive depot shot then this can cause acidity and make you feel as though you are hungry due to lot of acid. The other possibility is diabetes, hyperthyroid states and worms in the gut. All can keep you hungry 24x7. Though a rare disorder, pancreatic insulinomas should also be thought of in your case and have someone check your blood sugar while you have an anxiety *** hunger attack. The hypoglycemia in this is transient and there is a quick increase in blood glucose once you eat.Hope this helps. I think you should discuss these possibilities with your doctor. It is difficult to comment beyond this without examining. A comprehensive investigation is required keeping all the points in mind. Take care!

question: i am constantly hungry, i am 20 year old female who weighs at 88-90 lbs (4'7), i had 2 pizza slices and got hunry after 30 minutes so i had a salad then hour later i was hungry again and had another 2 slices. What is wrong with me? and yes i'm positive i'm not pregnant.
title: Always Hungry~~
